row.process: :IF &UC4RB_APP_FILTER_EXCLUDE# = "" OR "NULL" : SET &UC4RB_APP_FILTER_EXCLUDE# = "NULL" :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_APP_FILTER_EXCLUDE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_APP_FILTER_EXCLUDE#, " ") :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_APP_FILTER_EXCLUDE#,,WORKFLOW :IF &UC4RB_SERVER_FILTER_EXCLUDE# = "" OR "NULL" : SET &UC4RB_SERVER_FILTER_EXCLUDE# = "NULL" :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_SERVER_FILTER_EXCLUDE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_SERVER_FILTER_EXCLUDE#, " ") :ENDIF :PUBLISH &UC4RB_SERVER_FILTER_EXCLUDE#,,WORKFLOW
